About a year ago [I disclosed my depression to the interwebs](https://drewtyre.rbind.io/mental-health/). 
It seems timely to revisit the topic.

Consequences? Mostly outpouring of support! 

Leading Discussion of mental health. Symptoms of stigma. 

Current state

I have to remind myself that wellness is a process. I'm struggling now, but 
there is hope. I've surrounded myself with living things[^things], and my 
family is always close at hand. 

[^things]: Mushrooms, yeast, and lactic acid bacteria are alive! Our windows 
block too much light to grow plants indoors. I plan to start some outdoor herb 
planters as the weather warms up. And there is always this critter.
